text: Shlomo Smiltiner (27 November 191513 August 2015) was an Israeli chess master. He played thrice for Israel in Chess Olympiads. * In 1956, at second reserve board in 12th Chess Olympiad in Moscow (+3 –3 =2); * In 1958, at fourth board in 13th Chess Olympiad in Munich (+8 –4 =3); * In 1966, at second reserve board in 17th Chess Olympiad in Havana (+3 –2 =4). ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli chess players Category:Jewish chess players Category:Chess Olympiad competitors
title: Shlomo Smiltiner
